nodes.text: The Phantom Menace (French: La menace fantôme) is a junior novel adaptation of Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. The Phantom Menace was written by Catherine Kalengula and published by Hachette Jeunesse on May 17, 2017.
The inhabitants of the planet Naboo lead peaceful lives. Like their queen, Amidala, they are kind and peaceful people. However, one day, traders decide to attack them…
